# StandardMaterial — Property Reference
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties
# Legacy material — use PhysicalMaterial for PBR workflows.

## Colors
ambient : color                         # Ambient Color
diffuse : color                         # Diffuse Color (main color)
specular : color                        # Specular Color (highlight tint)
filterColor : color                     # transparency filter

## Levels
specularLevel : percent                 # highlight intensity 0-100
glossiness : percent                    # highlight sharpness 0-100
soften : float                          # highlight softening
opacity : percent                       # 0 = transparent, 100 = opaque

## Self-Illumination
selfIllumAmount : percent               # 0-100
selfIllumColor : color
useSelfIllumColor : boolean             # true = use color, false = use amount

## Options
shaderType : integer                    # 0=Anisotropic,1=Blinn,2=Metal,3=MultiLayer,4=Oren-Nayar-Blinn,5=Phong,6=Strauss,7=Translucent
wire : boolean
twoSided : boolean
faceMap : boolean
faceted : boolean
ior : float                             # index of refraction

## Map Slots (texturemap)
ambientMap, diffuseMap, specularMap, specularLevelMap,
glossinessMap, selfIllumMap, opacityMap, filterMap,
bumpMap, reflectionMap, refractionMap, displacementMap

## Map Amounts (percent)
ambientMapAmount, diffuseMapAmount, specularMapAmount,
specularLevelMapAmount, glossinessMapAmount, selfIllumMapAmount,
opacityMapAmount, bumpMapAmount, reflectionMapAmount,
refractionMapAmount, displacementMapAmount

## Map Enables (boolean)
ambientMapEnable, diffuseMapEnable, specularMapEnable,
specularLevelMapEnable, glossinessMapEnable, selfIllumMapEnable,
opacityMapEnable, bumpMapEnable, reflectionMapEnable,
refractionMapEnable, displacementMapEnable

## Locks
adLock : boolean                        # ambient-diffuse lock
dsLock : boolean                        # diffuse-specular lock
adTextureLock : boolean                 # ambient-diffuse texture lock
